name: Zombie Slayer the Gunner Shooter
description:
Zombie Slayer the Gunner Shooter

The best shooting Zombie game in this year is comes!

Zombie Shooter is a classic FPS game where the main target is to shoot deadly zombies.

Zombie shooter throws you into the arsenal of dead zombies where you have no second chance of survival if you get affected from the ebola virus, which turns humans into deadly zombies.

The Zombie Shooter , running dead zombies which increase the thrill of playing the Zombie Shooter in a 3D environment can come from all the city.
Amazing action scenes and gaming experience that will blow your mind await you! To get in on the fun, all you have to do is download now!

GAME FEATURES :

=> Kill different kinds of zombies!
=> New weapons and upgrade system!
=> Improve your skills
=> Kill different zombies
=> Easy and smooth game controls
